verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-Sa lifted up יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav, his eyes וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yaR and looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold עֵשָׂ֣ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav and behold Esau בָּ֔א <S%H935><s%> Ba, came וְעִמּ֕וֹ <S%H5973><s%> ve-'im-Mo with אַרְבַּ֥ע <S%H702><s%> 'ar-Ba' and with him four מֵא֖וֹת <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot hundred אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; men וַיַּ֣חַץ <S%H2673><s%> vai-Ya-chatz And he divided אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיְלָדִ֗ים <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim, the children עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- among לֵאָה֙ <S%H3812><s%> le-'Ah unto Leah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- among רָחֵ֔ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel, and unto Rachel וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al among שְׁתֵּ֥י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei and unto the two הַשְּׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <S%H8198><s%> hash-she-fa-Chot. handmaids

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem And he put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <S%H8198><s%> hash-she-fa-Chot the handmaids וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H3206><s%> yal-dei-Hen and their children רִֽאשֹׁנָ֑ה <S%H7223><s%> ri-sho-Nah; foremost וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et לֵאָ֤ה <S%H3812><s%> le-'Ah and Leah וִֽילָדֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H3206><s%> vi-la-Dei-ha and her children אַחֲרֹנִ֔ים <S%H314><s%> 'a-cha-ro-Nim, after וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רָחֵ֥ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel and Rachel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef and Joseph אַחֲרֹנִֽים׃ <S%H314><s%> 'a-cha-ro-Nim. hindermost

וְה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu himself עָבַ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> 'a-Var And he passed over לִפְנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem; before them וַיִּשְׁתַּ֤חוּ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu and bowed himself אַ֙רְצָה֙ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tzah to the ground שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' seven פְּעָמִ֔ים <S%H6471><s%> pe-'a-Mim, times עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until גִּשְׁתּ֖וֹ <S%H5066><s%> gish-To until he came near עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until אָחִֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv. to his brother

וַיָּ֨רָץ <S%H7323><s%> vai-Ya-rotz ran עֵשָׂ֤ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav And Esau לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-To to meet him וַֽיְחַבְּקֵ֔הוּ <S%H2263><s%> vay-chab-be-Ke-hu, and embraced וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol him and fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on צַוָּארָ֖ו <S%H6677><s%> tzav-va-Rav on his neck וַׅיִּׅשָּׁׅקֵ֑ׅהׅוּׅ <S%H5401><s%> vai-yish-sha-Ke-hu; and kissed him וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> vai-yiv-Ku. and they wept

וַיִּשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-Sa And he lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵינָ֗יו <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nav, his eyes וַיַּ֤רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנָּשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> han-na-Shim the women וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim, and the children וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh Who [are] those לָּ֑ךְ Lach; וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar with thee;And he said הַיְלָדִ֕ים <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim The children אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom חָנַ֥ן <S%H2603><s%> cha-Nan hath graciously given אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him which God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-De-cha. thy servant

וַתִּגַּ֧שְׁןָ <S%H5066><s%> vat-tig-Gash-na came near הַשְּׁפָח֛וֹת <S%H8198><s%> hash-she-fa-Chot Then the handmaidens הֵ֥נָּה <S%H2007><s%> Hen-nah with וְיַלְדֵיהֶ֖ן <S%H3206><s%> ve-yal-dei-Hen they and their children וַתִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֶֽיןָ׃ <S%H7812><s%> vat-Tish-ta-cha-Vei-na. and they bowed themselves

וַתִּגַּ֧שׁ <S%H5066><s%> vat-tig-Gash came near גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- likewise לֵאָ֛ה <S%H3812><s%> le-'Ah And Leah וִילָדֶ֖יהָ <S%H3206><s%> vi-la-Dei-ha also with her children וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֑וּ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-ta-cha-Vu; and bowed themselves וְאַחַ֗ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char, and after נִגַּ֥שׁ <S%H5066><s%> nig-Gash near יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Joseph וְרָחֵ֖ל <S%H7354><s%> ve-ra-Chel and Rachel וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוֽוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> vai-Yish-ta-cha-Vu. and they bowed

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said מִ֥י <S%H4310><s%> mi What לְךָ֛ le-Cha כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַמַּחֲנֶ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh What [meanest] thou by all this drove הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which פָּגָ֑שְׁתִּי <S%H6298><s%> pa-Ga-she-ti; which I met וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer ;And he said לִמְצֹא־ <S%H4672><s%> lim-tzo- [These are] to find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni. of my lord

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said עֵשָׂ֖ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav And Esau יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- I have לִ֣י li רָ֑ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav; enough אָחִ֕י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi my brother יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi have לְךָ֖ le-Cha אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- what לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, And Jacob אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- No נָא֙ <S%H4994><s%> na please אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na now מָצָ֤אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti Nay I pray thee if now I have found חֵן֙ <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha, in thy sight וְלָקַחְתָּ֥ <S%H3947><s%> ve-la-kach-Ta then receive מִנְחָתִ֖י <S%H4503><s%> min-cha-Ti my present מִיָּדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> mi-ya-Di; at my hand כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti for therefore I have seen פָנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nei-cha, thy face כִּרְאֹ֛ת <S%H7200><s%> kir-'Ot as though I had seen פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the face אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of God וַתִּרְצֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7521><s%> vat-tir-Tze-ni. and thou wast pleased with me

קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> kach- Take נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> na Please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּרְכָתִי֙ <S%H1293><s%> bir-cha-Ti I pray thee my blessing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֻבָ֣את <S%H935><s%> hu-Vat that is brought לָ֔ךְ Lach, כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because חַנַּ֥נִי <S%H2603><s%> chan-Na-ni hath dealt graciously with me אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him to thee because God וְכִ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi and because יֶשׁ־ <S%H3426><s%> yesh- I have לִי־ li- כֹ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> Chol; enough וַיִּפְצַר־ <S%H6484><s%> vai-yif-tzar- And he urged בּ֖וֹ bo וַיִּקָּֽח׃ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach. him and he took

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said נִסְעָ֣ה <S%H5265><s%> nis-'Ah Let us take our journey וְנֵלֵ֑כָה <S%H1980><s%> ve-ne-Le-chah; and go וְאֵלְכָ֖ה <S%H1980><s%> ve-'e-le-Chah will go לְנֶגְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-De-cha. before

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him אֲדֹנִ֤י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni unto him My lord יֹדֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H3045><s%> yo-De-a' knoweth כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that הַיְלָדִ֣ים <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim that the children רַכִּ֔ים <S%H7390><s%> rak-Kim, [are] tender וְהַצֹּ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> ve-hatz-Tzon and the flocks וְהַבָּקָ֖ר <S%H1241><s%> ve-hab-ba-Kar and herds עָל֣וֹת <S%H5763><s%> a-Lot with young עָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai; care וּדְפָקוּם֙ <S%H1849><s%> u-de-fa-Kum [are] with me and if men should overdrive י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day אֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad, them one וָמֵ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> va-Me-tu will die כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon. all the flock

יַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-vor- I pray thee pass over נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na Please אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni Let my lord לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before עַבְדּ֑וֹ <S%H5650><s%> av-Do; his servant וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni and I אֶֽתְנָהֲלָ֣ה <S%H5095><s%> 'et-na-ha-Lah and I will lead on לְאִטִּ֗י <S%H328><s%> le-'it-Ti, softly לְרֶ֨גֶל <S%H7272><s%> le-Re-gel according as הַמְּלָאכָ֤ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah the cattle אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- that לְפָנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nai that goeth before me וּלְרֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> u-le-Re-gel be able to endure הַיְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> hay-la-Dim, and the children עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- I אָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> 'a-Vo until I come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni unto my lord שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <S%H8165><s%> se-'I-rah. unto Seir

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said עֵשָׂ֔ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav, And Esau אַצִּֽיגָה־ <S%H3322><s%> 'atz-tzi-gah- Let me now leave נָּ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na Please עִמְּךָ֔ <S%H5973><s%> 'im-me-Cha, you מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- some הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am with thee [some] of the folk אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אִתִּ֑י <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ti; he וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer that [are] with me And he said לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah What זֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> Zeh, me אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> 'em-tza- needeth it;let me find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight אֲדֹנִֽי׃ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni. of my lord

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shav returned בַּיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom that day הַה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he עֵשָׂ֛ו <S%H6215><s%> 'e-Sav So Esau לְדַרְכּ֖וֹ <S%H1870><s%> le-dar-Ko on his way שֵׂעִֽירָה׃ <S%H8165><s%> se-'I-rah. unto Seir

וְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ve-ya-'a-Ko And Jacob נָסַ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> na-Sa' journeyed סֻכֹּ֔תָה <S%H5523><s%> suk-Ko-tah, to Succoth וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven and built ל֖וֹ lo בָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> Ba-yit; him an house וּלְמִקְנֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4735><s%> u-le-mik-Ne-hu for his cattle עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah and made סֻכֹּ֔ת <S%H5521><s%> suk-Kot, booths עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that קָרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> ka-Ra is called שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> shem- therefore the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <S%H4725><s%> ham-ma-Kom of the place סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <S%H5523><s%> suk-Kot. Succoth ס sa-Mek

וַיָּבֹא֩ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came יַעֲקֹ֨ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob שָׁלֵ֜ם <S%H8003><s%> sha-Lem safely עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir a city שְׁכֶ֗ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem, of Shechem אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz which [is] in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an, of Canaan בְּבֹא֖וֹ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'O when he came מִפַּדַּ֣ן mip-pad-Dan אֲרָ֑ם <S%H6307><s%> 'a-Ram; from Padanaram וַיִּ֖חַן <S%H2583><s%> vai-Yi-chan and pitched his tent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before הָעִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir. the city

וַיִּ֜קֶן <S%H7069><s%> vai-Yi-ken And he bought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֶלְקַ֣ת <S%H2513><s%> chel-Kat a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh, of a field אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he נָֽטָה־ <S%H5186><s%> na-tah- where he had spread שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> sham in it אָהֳל֔וֹ <S%H168><s%> o-ho-Lo, his tent מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad at the hand בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children חֲמ֖וֹר <S%H2544><s%> cha-Mor of Hamor אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi father שְׁכֶ֑ם <S%H7927><s%> she-Chem; Shechem's בְּמֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> be-me-'Ah for an hundred קְשִׂיטָֽה׃ <S%H7192><s%> ke-si-Tah. pieces of money

וַיַּצֶּב־ <S%H5324><s%> vai-yatz-tzev- And he erected שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there מִזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> miz-Be-ach; there an altar וַיִּ֨קְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> vai-Yik-ra- and called it ל֔וֹ lo, אֵ֖ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei angels יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. Israel ס sa-Mek
